question: Who has become fastest man to reach 7,000 Test runs?
explanation: Steve Smith has become the fastest man to score 7,000 Test runs in the ongoing second Test against Pakistan. He broke English great Wally Hammond’s record that had stood since 1946. Smith also passed Bradman\'s 6,996 Test runs.  It took Smith 70 Tests to do so, while Bradman needed only 52.
